segments.text: I notice the little boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s balancing on that stool like he’s done it a hundred times before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he’s ever fallen before or if he’s just lucky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for him, like she knows he’ll get them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a little happy for them because they’re working together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I’m also scared because that stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is right there, but she’s completely clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks so proud of himself for reaching the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a mix of funny and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it or if the mom will finally notice.
segments.speaker: PAR
